channel.description: Recent content on Today's Prayer Site

item.title: Today's Prayer
item.description: February 16, 2023 Today's Verse Isaiah 43:2 [2] When you pass through the waters, I will be with you; and through the rivers, they shall not overwhelm you; when you walk through fire you shall not be burned, and the flame shall not consume you. Today's Memory Verse 2 Corinthians 5:17 - Therefore, if anyone is in Christ, he is a new creation. The old has passed away; behold, the new has come.
